::CyberShark::

    Running through a field on Cybertron with Battera was what CyberShark was 
seeing. He felt so content, he had not a care in the world. Just then 
Magmatron loomed over the horizon, in a completely different form than he had 
seen. Almost immediately he was whisked away from Cybertron and Battera to a 
ship, he didn't have a TM2 body, just a regular Transformer body, with no 
alternate mode. He was after a mismatched hodgepodge of ships. They were a 
rogue band of Cybertronian space pirates known as the Seacons. There names 
were Coelagon, Halfshell, Scylle, Seaphantom and Terrormandar. And they 
formed the robot God Neptune (Piranacon for G1 fans). He hunted after them 
and shot all the ships they had, one though was only damaged enough to crash. 
It landed on a remote moon. They then formed the robot God Neptune. 
CyberShark had to adapt to the area, which was covered with water, he took 
the form of a Sharkish creature. They fought and fought and fought, 
CyberShark was nearly dead and he had only enough for one last trick, he 
popped a grenade and shoved it into the mouth of the Seacon. He was too weak 
to swim away and his ship was to far, the bomb exploded destroying the Seacon 
and CyberShark. He would never return to Cybertron.
    CyberShark woke with a start. He had been dreaming, he must have dozed 
off watching Pantron. He looked in the CR chamber, Pantron was gone. Then he 
checked the computer, it said he had left a few days ago. He had never 
returned. 
    "I've slept for a few days? That cloaking thing must have done it," 
CyberShark said to himself. He heard the servos moving in his stomach. Yep 
that was it, he was hungry.
    He started toward the cafeteria. On his way he ran into Battera, he 
didn't really know how to talk to her now.
    "Hi, I see you came back to the base. Have you enjoyed your stay?" He 
asked, very nervously.
